attributes.review: I think this app carries a virus 🦠 I wanted the app because I wanted to see how Trump THINKS HE is making America great again even tho it was never great. Natives where pushed out of their homes constantly and the killed off, that wasn’t great. Us African where brought from our home where we were peaceful and for what? To become your slaves because you guys are lazy and can’t do any basic task on your own. And baby don’t you ever call a black person lazy please, we built this whole country off of our backs that had whip marks all over that tree you told us to plant little did we know that you would use it to kill my son and then you go and rape us African women but I thought we were no good. And you think you better than us when in truth no your not. Here’s to you out  of office. BLM LGBTQIA 🏳️‍🌈 Abolish ICE Defund the police get you out Trump and then America might with the slightest chance we can work to greatness we have never in these many years achieved
attributes.title: Thoughts plz read this review

attributes.review: It all started when I was scrolling on TikTok and I saw this person preaching this amazing app. They said that it was the best way to keep up with Trump. But I couldn’t find an email address or his phone number anywhere on here. My plan was to call him and tell him everything that is wrong with the world because he clearly doesn’t know since he is too busy tweeting.This is really taking a toll on me and I’ve even considered ending it. So now I’ve been crying days not knowing what to do. I wanted to support our orange but I don’t know that I can anymore because of this terrible app. Sincerely your newly decided Democrat 🥰.
attributes.title: THIS APP RUING MY LIFE!

attributes.review:
Not only was a greeted by an obnoxiously wrinkly Oompa Loompa looking pig, but there was also a grainy person in the back ground. -67/100 for camera quality. Please do NOT, and I repeat DO NOTTTT download this app. Also the Oompa Loompa lookin pig was so big, it took up so much space on my phone I had to get a new one because it broke all the other apps😡😡. They were all cracked and everything. Also they asked for my phone number.. they must be tryna hack me or smt. Not to mention “trump” doesn’t give af about anyone but hisNarcissistic self, and we do NOT stan. If you love yourself and others and every don’t vote trump 2020 he trying to turn America into his own private play ground where he controls everything. 
Not to mention all the crimes he has committed which he should be in JAIL for. Also..

BLACK LIVES MATTER ✊🏻✊🏼✊🏽✊🏾✊🏿!!!
Which is obviously trump doesn’t support since he calls us thugs
